event: Sumerian cuneiform writing system
Cycladic civilization in Greece
Norte Chico civilization begins in Peru
Rise of Proto-Elamite Civilization in Iran
Skara Brae Scotland
First dynasty of Egypt
Egyptian calendar
Stonehenge construction begins. In its first version, it consisted of a circular ditch and bank, with 56 wooden posts
Cucuteni-Trypillian culture in Romania and the Ukraine
Jiroft civilization begins in Iran
First known use of papyrus by Egyptians
Kot Diji phase of the Indus Valley Civilization begins
Three Sovereigns and Five Emperors period in China
Minoan Civilization ancient palace city Knossos reach 80,000 inhabitants
Rise of Elam in Iran
The Old Kingdom begins in Egypt
Oldest known surviving literature: Sumerian texts from Abu Salabikh, including the Instructions of Shuruppak and the Kesh temple hymn
Mature Harappan phase of the Indus Valley civilization (in present-day Pakistan and India) begins
Emergence of Maya culture in the Yucat√°n Peninsula
King Khufu completes the Great Pyramid of Giza
The mammoth goes extinct
completion of Stonehenge
Yu the Great established the Xia Dynasty in China
Believed birth year of Abraham in Ur of the Chaldeans, Mesopotamia, who is the father of Abrahamic Religions
Domestication of the horse
alphabetic writing emerges
Indus Valley Civilization comes to an end but is continued by the Cemetery H culture
The beginning of Poverty Point Civilization in North America
Minoan civilization on Crete is destroyed by the Minoan eruption of Santorini island
Mycenaean Greece
The beginning of Shang Dynasty in China, evidence of a fully developed Chinese writing system
Beginning of Hittite dominance of the Eastern Mediterranean region
Composition of the Rigveda is completed
Olmec civilization flourishes in Pre-Columbian Mexico, during Mesoamerica's Formative period
Traditional date for giving of the Ten Commandments to Moses at Mount Sinai ushering in monotheistic religion
The Hallstatt culture
Bronze Age collapse in Southwestern Asia and in the Eastern Mediterranean region
Disintegration of Hittite Empire
Use of Iron spreads
The Zhou force (led by King Wu of Zhou) overthrow the last king of Shang Dynasty; Zhou Dynasty established in China
The beginning of the Kingdom of Israel
Approximate date for the composition of the Iliad and the Odyssey
Rise of Greek city-states
